titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding the right of citizens of the United States to health care of equal high quality.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/10/2000--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Declares that all citizens of the United states shall enjoy the right to health care of equal high quality.
